meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Betsy Chisolm Tim Callo Glenn Fleishman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6461.

td.p: Betsy Chisolm, a volunteer storyteller from Greeley, Colorado
Tim Callo, a manufacturing engineer from Sugar Land, Texas
Glenn Fleishman, a technology journalist from Seattle, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,398)

tr.td: STATE SYMBOLS OF HAWAII
FORMAL MOVIE TITLES
PEOPLE OF FAITH
HERE'S 2 "U"!
(Alex: There will be two of the letter "U"s in each correct response.)
A LONG TIME AGO
IN A GALAXY FAR, FAR AWAY

tr.td: Glenn
Tim
Betsy
BREAKING NEWS
LINE FROM THE TV SHOW
(Alex: Next, we'll give you a [*], you identify the show for me.)
19th CENTURY FEMALE AUTHORS
CRIME
4-LETTER FILL IN THE PROVERB
THEY DRIVE ON THE LEFT IN...

')
